item.title: 欧洲最新的创业趋势：制造人工智能武器
item.description:
一批防务新秀希望欧洲军队实现现代化，并发放合同

。【原文：

A crop of defense newcomers wants European militaries to modernize — and dole out contracts

】

item.title: 雇主告诉码头工人，美国港口 "必须发展
item.description: 美国的零售商、制造商和其他货物托运人通常会在节假日高峰过后努力喘口气，他们可能需要加强应急计划，以应对下个月美国几个最大港口不合时宜的关闭。【原文：US retailers, manufacturers and other cargo shippers that typically try to catch their breath after the holiday rush might want to step up their contingency planning for ill-timed closures at several of the nation’s biggest ports next month.】

item.title: 韩国的政治后果可能影响增长和市场
item.description: 我是驻香港的亚洲经济记者卡蒂娅-德米特里耶娃。今天我们将关注韩国事件的余波以及要求总统尹锡烈辞职的呼声。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Katia Dmitrieva, Asia economics correspondent in Hong Kong. Today we’re looking at the fallout from events in South Korea and calls for President Yoon Suk Yeol to resign. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 11 月石油收入在原油暴跌中遭受重创
item.description: 受国家原油价格下跌的影响，克里姆林宫 11 月份的石油收入连续第二个月同比下降。【原文：The Kremlin’s oil revenues in November fell from a year earlier for a second consecutive month, spurred by lower prices for the nation’s crude.】

item.title: 韩国和法国提出坚持美国市场的理由
item.description: 从首尔到巴黎，本周的政治混乱更加深了许多投资者选择坚守美国市场的原因。【原文：The political chaos spanning Seoul to Paris this week is reinforcing why many investors have chosen to stick to American markets.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔在与 Cerberus 的英国财产纠纷中获胜 3.58 亿欧元
item.description: 萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）在与 Cerberus 资本管理公司（Cerberus Capital Management LP）有关西班牙房地产资产交易的诉讼中胜诉，赢得了伦敦法官 3.58 亿欧元（3.765 亿美元）的赔偿。【原文：Banco Sabadell SA won a lawsuit against Cerberus Capital Management LP over a deal struck linked to Spanish real estate assets, winning a €358 million ($376.5 million) award from a London judge.】

item.title: 南非节日期间消费者情绪为2019年以来最乐观
item.description: 在冠状病毒大流行之前，南非的一项消费者信心指数达到了自 2019 年以来节日期间的最佳水平，这预示着随着今年的结束，消费可能会持续增长。【原文：A South African consumer confidence gauge reached its best festive-season level since 2019, before the coronavirus pandemic struck, signaling spending is likely to be sustained as the year closes out.】

item.title: 挪威房价连续第四个月上涨
item.description: 挪威调整后的房价连续第四个月上涨，超过了央行的预期，并可能降低3月前降息的预期。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices gained for a fourth month in a row, exceeding the central bank’s projections and likely reducing expectations of an interest rate cut before March.】

item.title: 马士基卖出评级叠加航运业供应过剩担忧
item.description: 随着对航运市场供过于求的担忧重现，A.P. Moller - Maersk A/S 的卖出建议不断增加。【原文：Sell recommendations on A.P. Moller - Maersk A/S shares are piling up as worries return about oversupply in the shipping market.】

item.title: 为什么唐纳德-特朗普和哈维尔-米莱在紧缩问题上有天壤之别？
item.description: 从他们的发型、社交媒体和对付对手的策略来看，唐纳德-特朗普和阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱似乎如出一辙。但风格和实质是两码事。【原文：Looking at their hairstyles, social media and tactics against opponents, Donald Trump and Argentine President Javier Milei seem to be cut from the same cloth. But style and substance are two different things.】

item.title: 在美国寻找新工作的时间越来越长
item.description: 在美国，失业者更难找到工作，这一趋势给其他统计数据蒙上了一层阴影，这些数据显示劳动力市场充满活力，几乎没有出现问题的外在迹象。【原文：The unemployed are having a harder time finding jobs in the US, a trend that’s casting a shadow over other statistics showing a resilient labor market with few outward signs of trouble.】

item.title: 投资者倒计时法国投票可能推翻政府
item.description: 在不信任投票可能导致法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶政府下台之前，法国债券市场周三趋于稳定。【原文：French bond markets steadied on Wednesday ahead of a no-confidence vote that could bring down Prime Minister Michel Barnier’s administration.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利发出明年将降息四次的预期信号
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，决策者仍然认为明年降息四个季度是最有可能发生的情况，因为他说通胀下降的速度 "比我们想象的要快"。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey signaled that policymakers still believe four quarter-point interest rate cuts next year is the most likely scenario as he said inflation has come down “faster than we thought it would.”】

item.title: 武契奇告诉《政治家》：欧洲央行应继续 "小步快跑 "地削减开支
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）告诉 Politico，欧洲中央银行应继续逐步放宽货币政策。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue moving gradually as it eases monetary policy, Governing Council member Boris Vujcic told Politico.】

item.title: 沃达丰将出售印度铁塔公司 Indus 的剩余股份
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）在 6 月份出售了价值 18 亿美元的印度 Indus Towers Ltd. 股份后，将出售其剩余股份。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc is to sell its remaining stake in India’s Indus Towers Ltd. after offloading $1.8 billion worth of shares in June.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚动用部分外汇缓冲资金支付动荡中的开支
item.description: 罗马尼亚财政部长马塞尔-博洛斯（Marcel Bolos）表示，在政治紧张局势加剧影响投资者偏好的情况下，罗马尼亚不得不动用部分缓冲资金，以应对过去两个月约60亿欧元（63亿美元）的支付高峰。【原文：Romania had to tap part of its funding buffer to cover a peak in payments of about €6 billion ($6.3 billion) in the past two months amid rising political tensions that affected investor appetite, Finance Minister Marcel Bolos said.】

item.title: 加纳通胀率在大选前升至六个月新高
item.description: 11 月，在这个西非国家大选前三天，加纳的年通货膨胀率跃升至六个月来的最高点。【原文：Ghana’s annual inflation rate jumped to a six-month high in November, three days before elections in the West African nation.】

item.title: 法国核公司称尼日尔军政府接管铀矿
item.description: 法国国家控制的核集团与非洲国家军政府之间的冲突不断升级，奥拉诺（Orano SA）称尼日尔已控制了索迈尔（Somair）铀矿的运营。【原文：Orano SA said Niger has taken operational control of the Somair uranium mine, in an escalating clash between the French state-controlled nuclear group and African nation’s military junta.】

item.title: 中国住房问题持续发酵，碧桂园销售下滑加剧
item.description: 中国建筑商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese builder Country Garden Holdings Co.’s sales slump exacerbated in November, adding to the Chinese developer’s liquidity concern as it gains more time to map out a debt overhaul.】

item.title: 中国 11 月汽车销量将因补贴热潮激增 18
item.description: 由于汽车制造商加大了折扣力度，而购车者又急于在政府以旧换新补贴结束前利用这一补贴，11 月份中国的汽车销量很可能激增。【原文：China’s car sales likely surged in November as carmakers ramped up discounts and buyers rushed to take advantage of the government’s trade-in subsidy before it ends.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚将 10 家公司的所有权转给主权财富基金
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚将 10 家国有企业的所有权转让给政府的主权财富基金，作为改善其管理的措施之一。【原文：Ethiopia transferred ownership of 10 state-owned companies to the government’s sovereign wealth fund as part of steps to improve their management.】

item.title: 修订后的英国企业采购经理人指数显示，英国企业勉强避免了经济萎缩
item.description: 修订后的采购管理数据显示，由于人们对工党政府首份预算案中的增税措施日益担忧，11 月份英国私营部门的表现创下了 13 个月以来的最弱记录。【原文：The UK private sector suffered the weakest performance in 13 months in November amid mounting concerns over tax hikes in the Labour government’s first budget, revised purchasing-management data show.】

item.title: Teleport 首席执行官表示，Teleport 将在 2025 年实现增长，以证明其 IPO 资质
item.description: Capital A Bhd. 的物流部门 Teleport 的首席执行官周三表示，该公司希望明年持续的两位数增长能帮助其 "赢得 "考虑上市的 "权利"。【原文：Capital A Bhd.’s logistics arm Teleport is hoping sustained double-digit growth next year will help it “earn its right” to consider a public listing, the company’s chief executive officer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 纳米比亚连续第三次将关键利率降至 7
item.description: 随着通胀率降至三年多来的最低点，纳米比亚中央银行连续第三次下调了关键利率。【原文：Namibia’s central bank lowered its key interest rate for a third time in a row as inflation eased to a more than three-year low.】

item.title: 意大利大亨卡尔塔吉罗内增持帕斯奇银行股份至 5
item.description: 意大利建筑业大亨弗朗切斯科-加埃塔诺-卡尔塔吉罗内（Francesco Gaetano Caltagirone）在收购锡耶纳蒙蒂帕奇银行股份有限公司（Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA）的主要控股权仅一个月后，又增持了该公司的股份。【原文：Italian construction tycoon Francesco Gaetano Caltagirone has raised his stake in Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA just a month after buying a major holding in the lender.】

item.title: 贸易战风险加剧，沙特股市有望反弹
item.description: 沙特股市自 2020 年以来首次落后于新兴市场基准，但一些投资者认为有几个原因可以解释为什么明年的情况会更好。【原文：Saudi stocks are trailing emerging-market benchmarks for the first time since 2020, but some investors see several reasons why next year could turn out better.】

item.title: 经济合作与发展组织（OECD）称，如果不增加税收，英国的财政状况将难以为继
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）在上调英国经济增长预测时表示，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）需要进一步提高税收，以确保公共财政的可持续发展。【原文：British Chancellor Rachel Reeves will need to raise taxes further to get the public finances on a sustainable footing, the OECD said as it upgraded its growth forecasts for the UK.】

item.title: 经合组织警告：世界正面临从贸易紧张到债务的危险
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）表示，全球经济面临着从贸易紧张局势到战争和债务问题等层出不穷的风险，这些风险可能会威胁到其过去几年 "非凡的恢复力"。【原文：The global economy faces proliferating risks ranging from trade tensions to wars and debt troubles that could threaten its “remarkable resilience” of past years, the OECD said.】

item.title: 埃及结束联合银行发行，资产出售计划取得进展
item.description: 埃及完成了首次公开发行联合银行 30% 股份的工作，这是在国际货币基金组织支持下出售国有资产、促进经济发展的努力中迈出的一步。【原文：Egypt concluded its initial public offering of 30% of United Bank, a step forward in an International Monetary Fund-backed drive to sell off state assets and boost the economy.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博称不太可能因政治动荡而降息
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）表示，央行不太可能因短暂的政治事件而降息。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong said it is unlikely the central bank will cut interest rates in response to a short-lived political event.】
